title: The Subtle Art of Raising Sons, with Dr. Cara Natterson
description:
Jillian shares the positive things that came out of her recent loss. Plus, Dr. Cara Natterson, author of “Decoding Boys, New Science Behind the Subtle Art of Raising Sons,” is on to talk about healthy parenting, from male puberty to handling bad behavior.

Guest links: WorryProofMD.com, MyOomla.com

Start your FREE 7 day trial for Jillian’s My Fitness App at https://go.jillianmichaels.com/WNt1rL7uyZ

Send us your brief question at jillianpodcast@gmail.com

Follow us on Instagram @JillianMichaels and @MartiniCindy
